hanzi-su-wiki:
芸

Значения

Искусство, умение, игра

Мнемоника

Искусство хорошо говорить 云 и пользоваться «травяными» 艹, т.е. скорописными иероглифами.

Варианты

藝, 蕓, 艺
purpleculture_pinyin:
yì
Japanese variant of 艺
Японский вариант 艺

yún
see 芸薹 ; common rue (Ruta graveolens); books and libraries
см. 芸薹; рута обыкновенная (Ruta graveolens); книги и библиотеки
rtega_mnemonic:
芸芸RStechnique, art, craft, performance
  • two individuals 云 preparing herbs 艹 as medicine: special technique or craft
  • mouth whispering 云 to herbs 艹 being prepared for medicine: special technique or craft
purpleculture_info:
(Trad.: 蕓)
Pictophonetic: 云 indicates the sound; 艹 (plant) conveys the meaning.
purpleculture_examples:
芸芸众生 [ yún yún zhòng shēng ]: every living being (Buddhism); the mass of common people
芸豆 [ yún dòu ]: kidney bean
芸香 [ yún xiāng ]: Rutaceae; the citrus family
芸薹 [ yún tái ]: rape (plant)
芸芸 [ yún yún ]: numerous; diverse and varied

heisig_constituent: technique, flowers, rising cloud, two, elbow, wall
heisig_story: The secret technique of making a rising cloud of smoke turn into a bouquet of flowers is shown here.
Keyword_KANJIDIC: technique, art, craft, performance, acting, trick, stunt
Keyword_KANJIDIC_ru: техника, искусство, ремесло, производительность, актерское мастерство, хитрость, каскадер
koohiiStory1: Imagine an old Kung-fu movie: "Try my rising cloud flower technique!!!" smash pow crack!! .
koohiiStory2: One technique to smoke weed is to vaporize it and inhale those rising clouds to create a stronger effect.
jp_example_words:
学芸(がくげい): arts and sciences, liberal arts
手芸(しゅげい): handicrafts
園芸(えんげい): horticulture, gardening
芸術(げいじゅつ): fine art, the arts
芸能(げいのう): public entertainment, accomplishments, attainments
工芸(こうげい): industrial arts
文芸(ぶんげい): literature, art and literature
WaniKani_Meaning_Mnemonic: There are fake flowers at your feet and fake clouds above you because you're acting.
WaniKani_Meaning_Info: Imagine acting in a play or a movie where there are flowers and clouds all around you. You're singing and smiling and dancing and acting your absolute heart out!
WaniKani_Reading_Mnemonic: You have to do some acting that involves you being gay (げい). You should imagine this scene, whether you're gay and it's not actual acting or not.
WaniKani_Reading_Info: Maybe you'll love it, maybe you'll hate it. Whatever happens, feel that emotion well up, as the flowers and clouds spin around you, and you act out the scene.
Ru_Meaning: technique, art, craft, performance, acting, trick, stunt

芸字的基本解释

芸
（蕓）
yún
即“油菜”，亦称“芸薹”。
古同“耘”，除草。

芸字的汉语字典释义

[①]［yún］
［《廣韻》王分切，平文，云。］
(1)香草名。即芸香。
(2)菜名。
(3)通“耘”。除草。
(4)“蕓”的简化字。
[②]［yùn］
［《集韻》王問切，去焮，云。］
花草枯黄貌。

芸字的康熙字典解释

【申集上】【艸字部】　芸； 康熙笔画：10； 页码：页1021第07
【廣韻】【集韻】玉分切【韻會】【正韻】于分切，?音雲。【說文】草也，似目宿。【禮·月令】芸始生。【註】芸，香草也。【爾雅翼】芸類豌豆，叢生，其葉極芳香，秋後葉閒微白如粉，南人採置席下，能去蚤蝨。今謂之七里香。【續博物志】《典略》云：芸香辟紙魚蠹，故藏書臺稱芸臺。【成公綏·芸香賦】美芸香之脩潔，合隂陽之淑淸。　又【急就篇註】芸，芸蒿也，生熟皆可啗。　又【拾遺記】芳蔬園多異菜，有菜名芸薇，紫色者最繁，一名芸芝。　又多貌。【老子·道德經】夫物芸芸，各復歸其根。　又通耘。【論語】植其杖而芸。【何晏註】除草曰芸。　又音運。【詩·小雅】裳裳者華，芸其黃矣。　【集韻】作?。

（蕓）【唐韻】【集韻】?玉分切，音云。【玉篇】蕓薹菜。【本草註】此菜易起薹，須採其薹，則分枝必多，故名蕓薹。淮人謂之薹芥。　又蕓香草也。【杜陽雜編】元載造蕓輝堂於私第，其香出于闐國，潔白如玉，舂之爲屑以塗壁。　【集韻】或作蒷。
芸字的源字形

芸字的起名意思

：即“油菜”，亦称“芸薹”；古同“耘”，耕耘；众多，来自成语“芸芸众生”。

Yun
Basic explanation of words
Yun
(Yun)
yún
Namely "Rape", also known as "Brassica napus".
Gu Tong "yun", weeding.
Yun
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①]［yún］
["Guangyun" Wang divided cut, plain text, cloud. ]
(1) Vanilla name. Namely Ruta.
(2) The name of the dish.
(3) Through "yun". weeding.
(4) The simplified character of "yun".
[②]［yùn］
["Ji Yun" Wang Wenqie, go to Yan, Yun. ]
Flowers and plants withered yellow appearance.
Yun

[Guang Yun] [Ji Yun] Jade Slitting [Yun Hui] [Zheng Rhyme] In Slitting,? Yinyun. [Said the text] The grass is also like the head. [Li·Yue Ling] Yun Shisheng. [Note] Yun, vanilla too. This is called Qilixiang. [Continued History of Natural History] "Dianlue" says: Yunxiang is a paper fish beetle, so the library is called Yuntai. [Chenggongsui·Ruexiang Fu] Meiyunxiang's repair and cleansing, combined with the yin and yang.　[Anxious to the post] Yun, Artemisia annua, both raw and cooked can be eaten.　[Supplementary Notes] There are many different dishes in Fangshu Garden. The dish is named Yunwei. The purple one is the most complicated, and the other is Yunzhi.　A lot of looks. [Lao Tzu·Tao Te Jing] All the wives and things are back to their roots.　Tong Yun again. [The Analects] Plant his stick and Yun. [He Yan's Note] Weeding said Yun.　Yinyun again. 【Poetry·Xiaoya】The clothes are beautiful, and the clouds are yellow.　【Jiyun】make?. (Yun) [Tang Yun] [Ji Yun]? Jade split, sound cloud. 【Jade articles】Brassica oleracea. [Notes on Materia Medica] This dish is easy to sprout, and the sprouts must be picked, so there will be more branches, hence the name Brassica oleracea. Huai people call it scallop.　You Yun vanilla too. [Du Yang Miscellaneous] Yuan Zai built Yunhuitang in the private house. Its fragrance came from the state of Tian, and it was as white as jade, and it was used as crumbs to paint the walls.　【Jiyun】or Zuoju. Yun
Source glyph
Yun
Name meaning
: Namely "oilseed rape", also known as "canola"; the ancient same "yun", ploughing; numerous, from the idiom "all living beings".
芸
形声字。艸(+)表意,其形像草,表示芸是香草;云(yin)表声,其形像云气缭绕,表示香草芳香缭绕。本义是芸
香。蕾(从+、雲声),本义是藝墓,即油菜。螢现简化为芸。
O[芸香]多年生草本植物,花黄色,花、叶、茎都有香气,
可人药。2[芸墓]即油菜,二年生草本植物,花黄色,种子可
榨油。
~豆~蒿 ~墓 ~香~~众生
yún
芸。
Ψ
号
芸
隶
楷
Юнь
Пиктофонетические символы.
艸 (+) означает, что его форма похожа на траву, что означает, что Юнь - это ваниль; облако (инь) выражает звук, а его форма похожа на облако, что означает, что ваниль ароматна и ароматна.
Lei (от +, Yunsheng), изначальное значение - Yi Tomb, то есть изнасилование.
Firefly теперь упрощен до Yun.
O [芸香] Многолетние травы, желтые цветы, цветы, листья, стебли имеют аромат, и это лекарство.
2 [芸 墓] - это рапс, двулетнее растение с желтыми цветами, и семена можно выжимать для получения масла.
~ Боб ~ Артемизия ~ Могила ~ Аромат ~~ Все существа
Юн.
Ψ
номер
Юнь
писец
Кай
yún
I сущ.
1) рута (душистое растение, листья употреблялись для уничтожения книжной моли)
2) перен. книги, литература
芸馆 книгохранилище
3) сурепица
菜芸 собирать сурепицу
II прил. /наречие
ярко-жёлтый цвет; цвет увядшей листвы
芸其黄矣 жёлтый цвет их листьев
III гл.
вм. 耘 (полоть)
IV собств.
Юнь (фамилия)
Radicals: 艹, 云  (flowers, cloud)
Meaning Mnemonic
There are fake flowers at your feet and fake clouds above you because you're acting.
Imagine acting in a play or a movie where there are flowers and clouds all around you. You're singing and smiling and dancing and acting your absolute heart out!
Reading Mnemonic
You have to do some acting that involves you being gay (げい). You should imagine this scene, whether you're gay and it's not actual acting or not.
Maybe you'll love it, maybe you'll hate it. Whatever happens, feel that emotion well up, as the flowers and clouds spin around you, and you act out the scene.
